attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have heard from a Zimbabwean with traumatic tales of how homes are now being destroyed with the families inside them. They then have to live outside in zero degrees with no furniture, food, blankets or any means of keeping warm.This is on top of the destroyed sanitary system.......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
